index-content.head_title: .NET, Java, Cloud APIs & Online Document Parser Apps
index-content.head_description: Get all-in-one document parsing solution for .NET, Java and cloud-based applications. Extract data from document formats online using simple drag and drop feature
index-content.title: Document Parsing Solution
index-content.description: Extract data from documents and images on any platform using our flexible APIs and app based solutions for programmers and end-users.
index-content.api_high_1_content: Native .NET API to extract text, images, metadata from Microsoft Office, PDF, images and various other formats in .NET applications.
index-content.api_high_2_content: Empower Java applications with data extraction from wide range of documents & images on any operating system with JDK installed.
index-content.api_low_1_content: Work with cURL RESTful document parsing API to extract data from all popular document formats including PDF, Word, Excel & images.
index-content.api_low_2_content: Use Parser RESTful API easily with .NET SDK to extract data from a number of document formats within .NET applications.
index-content.api_low_3_content: Implement advanced document parsing features in your java applications with specially designed document parsing SDK for Java.
index-content.api_nocode_1_content: Free online app to parse Word, Excel, PowerPoint, PDF & 30+ more document types.
index-content.api_nocode_2_content: Parse Word documents directly from your web browser to extract images, text or metadata.
index-content.api_nocode_3_content: Free PDF parsing app that works on any platform or device without any limitations.
index-content.actions_description: Try GroupDocs.Parser features for free or request a license

net.title: Native .NET API for Document Parsing

code.title: Extract text from PDF files in C#
code.instance: Create an instance of Parser class
code.extract: Extract a text into the reader
code.print_1: Print a text from the document
code.print_2: If text extraction isn't supported, a reader is null

net.overview_description: API for performing document parsing in .NET applications

overview_feature_1.title: Extract data from documents
overview_feature_1.description: .NET API enables you to retrieve text, metadata, and images from a wide range of file formats such as Office documents, emails, attachments, and archives. This powerful tool helps you efficiently access and process valuable information contained within these files for various applications like data analysis, search engine indexing, or content management systems.

overview_feature_2.title: Parse documents
overview_feature_2.description: Extract various elements such as hyperlinks, tables, QR codes, barcodes and data from PDF forms. Also parse any desired information from documents using custom templates.

overview_feature_3.title: Customizing results
overview_feature_3.description: .NET API enables you to retrieve data in various formats such as raw, structured, HTML, or Markdown. Additionally, API offers a search functionality for locating specific words or phrases within the text of documents.

features.title: GroupDocs.Parser features
features.description: Extract data from PDFs, Office Documents, and Images swiftly and accurately.

feature_1.title: Extract text
feature_1.content: Extract textual information from various file formats such as office documents, PDF files and images for easy readability and analysis.

feature_2.title: Extract images
feature_2.content: Retrieve visual content from diverse sources like office documents, PDF files for convenient access and use.

feature_3.title: Scan QR Codes
feature_3.content: Detect and decode QR codes present within office documents, PDF files, or visual content for efficient information retrieval.

feature_4.title: Extract data from email attachments and archives
feature_4.content: Gather valuable information from email messages, file attachments, and compressed data sources for effective analysis and utilization.

feature_5.title: Extract tables
feature_5.content: Identify and extract tabular data from PDF documents for organized analysis and use.

feature_6.title: Extract hyperlinks
feature_6.content: Locate and extract hyperlinks and email addresses within office documents or PDF files for efficient access .

feature_7.title: Parse PDF Forms
feature_7.content: PDF Forms are digital documents featuring fillable fields for user interaction, allowing them to input information electronically. .NET API can be utilized to extract data from these forms for efficient processing.

feature_8.title: Parse data by templates
feature_8.content: Create custom templates and utilize them with .NET API to parse specific information from PDF files, simplifying data extraction processes.

feature_9.title: Search a text in documents
feature_9.content: Quickly locate specific words or patterns within documents.

net.platforms_description: GroupDocs.Parser for .NET supports the following operating systems, frameworks and package managers
net.formats_description: GroupDocs.Parser for .NET supports operations with the following [file formats](https://docs.groupdocs.com/parser/net/supported-document-formats/).
